title: 2.48 Do You Think You’re What They Say You Are?
itunes:title: Do You Think You’re What They Say You Are?
description: What solid statements can we make about the life of Jesus? Who did Jesus think he was? We can never know, but we can make some guesses. Certainly, he thought he was like an Old Testament prophet. He believed that God's kingly rule was about to intervene. Jesus believed that his mission was to prepare the Jews for God’s imminent intervention in the world. Did Jesus intend to found a new religion? I doubt it.

itunes:author: Garry Stevens
